title: Loss Prevention
description: Prevention, control, and supervision of cargo loading/unloading in maritime and air transport. Management of imported or exported cargo to prevent losses and control damages.

title: Claims
description: Inspection, assessment, adjustment, and settlement of claims in the areas of Civil Liability and D&O, General Risks and Aviation, Transport, and Hulls.

title: Recoveries and Salvage
description: Regarding recoveries, our work focuses on recovering economic losses in transport services from those found responsible, whether through out-of-court or judicial proceedings. Regarding salvage, our work focuses on promoting, placing, selling, or disposing of damaged or rejected goods or products.
